title: Saturday Night / Font ID
content:
Greetings ,

I love the good challenge of tracking down fonts , but sadly I’ve run into one that has thrown me a curve.

Would anyone happen to recognize the font used in the image below , Saturday Night?

Any help is greatly appreciated , and I do thank you in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091023130117im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wcwsn_5624.jpg)
author: McNicols_Pro

comments.content:
That’s awesome , and very quick I might add! Thank you again Jan for your reply.

Cheers!
